review: The most cost-effective, easy to use device to add WiFi to a HDTV.  I have 3 Blue-ray with Wi Fi and a Google Chrome to add WiFi to my TVs.  The Fire TV Stick is by far the fastest response and easiest to use.  The Google Chrome is totally unsatisfactory compared to the Fire TV Stick.  I will be buying several more for my own applications and as gifts for friends.

author: Sneekypete "Pete"

review: EXTREMELY DISAPPOINTED IN THIS!!!  DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT IF YOU DO NOT PAY FOR CABLE OR PAY A TV SUBSCRIPTION.  Despite nothing being stated about "What You Need" and Technical information, many of the apps that are advertised cannot be used with a cable subscription.  We purchased this item because we do not have cable.  Nothing in the requirements stated that cable was required.  In the 14 long pages of information here, only a single sentence is mentioned, under "What's On Fire Stick".I understand Amazon Prime membership being needed to use this product.  I understand Netflix subscription being needed.  If a cable subscription is needed to access apps that are advertised as available on this product, IT SHOULD BE STATED AS A TECHNICAL REQUIREMENT.
